Class DefaultTLSSocket

java.lang.Object
com.mimecast.robin.smtp.security.DefaultTLSSocket
All Implemented Interfaces:
TLSSocket
public class DefaultTLSSocket extends Object implements TLSSocket
Standard TLS handshake negociation implementation.
